name: Rebeat Tracker
description: This is where she counts a rebeat.

time-format.name: Time Format
time-format.description: Choose whether to use the 12-hour or 24-hour time format.

calculate-attempts.name: Calculate Attempts
calculate-attempts.description: Calculates and displays the change in attempts between completions rather than the total level attempts. You must reload the popup for changes to take place.

endscreen-button.name: Endscreen Button
endscreen-button.description: Adds the completion popup button to the endscreen.

confirm-completion.name: Confirm Completion
confirm-completion.description: Upon completing a level, a popup to confirm saving the completion will appear.

autofill.name: Autofill
autofill.description: Automatically autofill data from the level when opening the 'Create Completion' menu.

blue-button.name: Use green button
blue-button.description: Uses a blue version of the completion menu button instead of the default green.
